town_guards.name: Town Guard
town_guards.description: The peacekeepers of Rogue City, dedicated to maintaining law and order.

merchants.name: Merchant Guild
merchants.description: Traders and shopkeepers focused on commerce and profit.

priests.name: Temple of Light
priests.description: Servants of divine powers dedicated to healing and protecting the innocent.

thieves_guild.name: Thieves Guild
thieves_guild.description: A shadow organization dealing in theft, information, and illicit services.

scholars.name: Academy of Learning
scholars.description: Seekers of knowledge and magical understanding.

nobles.name: Noble Houses
nobles.description: The wealthy and influential families who shape politics and society.

common_folk.name: Common Citizens
common_folk.description: The everyday people of Rogue City - farmers, crafters, workers.

paladins.name: Order of Paladins
paladins.description: Holy warriors dedicated to justice and fighting evil.

necromancers.name: Circle of Necromancers
necromancers.description: Dark practitioners of death magic and forbidden arts.

cultists.name: Shadow Cult
cultists.description: Worshippers of dark powers and chaos.

assassins.name: Assassins Guild
assassins.description: Professional killers operating in the shadows.

smugglers.name: Smugglers Network
smugglers.description: Traders in contraband and forbidden goods.

demons.name: Demonic Forces
demons.description: Supernatural entities of pure evil and chaos.

rangers.name: Forest Rangers
rangers.description: Guardians of the wilderness and natural order.

druids.name: Druid Circle
druids.description: Keepers of ancient nature magic and balance.
